metadata.inclusion: Press the push pad to turn on the switch. The Locator LED will turn OFF when inclusion is successful.
metadata.exclusion: Press the push pad to turn on the switch. The locator LED will turn OFF when exclusion is successful.
metadata.reset:
1. Engage the air-gap switch by gently pressing the top of the push pad until the bottom lifts completely out of the frame and a click is heard
2. Wait 5 seconds and then press the push pad back into the frame and hold until the locator LED turns Amber and then flashes Red
